You can check the fetch status codes in the glossary:
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.html
(Scroll a little down the page)

-50 means waiting for a precondition (DNS / robots.txt)
-5000 means out of scope and scope changed

I can't figure out what happend - maybe try and post your order.xml to the list

best
--

waisovsky wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi
> 
> I am using Heritrix on windows and it's configured apparently well.
> The problem, however is whenever i want to run a job -or mostly- it is
> completed as soon as I submit it. That's the case with both the
> default profile and my own defined one.
> 
> Does anyone know what the problem could be?
> 
> I get often the following entries on crawl.log:
> 
> -50 - http://<some-site>/ - - no-type #004 -
> -5000 - http://<some-site>/ - - no-type #001 -
> 0 - http://<some-site>/ - - no-type #003 -
> ...
> 
> thanx for help:)
> 
> M.
> 
>
